SELECT A.GAME_NO, A.GAME_DATE, A.GAME_ROUND, A.SEASON_CODE, A.HOME_CODE, B.TEAM_NAME AS HOME_NAME, A.HOME_SPOINT, A.AWAY_CODE, C.TEAM_NAME AS AWAY_NAME, A.AWAY_SPOINT FROM game_schedule A LEFT JOIN team B ON A.HOME_CODE = B.TEAM_CODE LEFT JOIN team C ON A.AWAY_CODE = C.TEAM_CODE WHERE A.HOME_SPOINT IS NOT NULL
AND (A.HOME_CODE = #{team} OR A.AWAY_CODE = #{team}) ORDER BY A.GAME_NO DESC LIMIT 0, 5
